*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Durst to Austin, Nacogdoches, November 24, 1829. Will follow procedure advised by Austin concerning Guerrero's emancipation decree. Character of the local authorities.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdochs*/location_mentioned*.*date_mentioned n="11-24-1829"> Novr 24 de 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir I receivd yours of the *date_mentioned n="11-17-1829">17th Instant*/date_mentioned* and am very thankful to you for the troble you have taken in the complyence of my request, it has aforded Great Satisfaction to our *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned*, and I am confident that the corse indicated will unanimosley be adopted to a man; you wish to Know what the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamto*/person_mentioned*. of this place will do it is hard telling so farr they have agreed to cooparate with My vews on that subject, but there [is] no Knowing what turn they may take they are a Boddy without souls and subjects easy worked on by intrigue the *person_mentioned*Militery comte*/person_mentioned*,. of this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*has a considerable influence over them and is much of a *person_mentioned*scoundrel*/person_mentioned*, I have this day been credibly informd that he has long since conceivd the Plan of efecting a revolution amonst the *person_mentioned*Slaves */person_mentioned*against their *person_mentioned*Masters*/person_mentioned* he has even told me previos to this that he was astonished it did nott take place, but Little did I suspect him Capable of inducing them What are we to do with such a rascal, I hope el *person_mentioned*Sor. Padilla*/person_mentioned* will soon be on and put things to wright*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Durst */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
